statement.p:
Consider a thin bar of constant cross-sectional area that has mass density function \rho(x) = {{function}} , where x is measured in centimeters from the end of the bar and \rho(x) is measured in grams per centimeter. Suppose that the rod is {{length}} centimeters long.
Write down an integral which computes the total mass of this bar.
Write down an expression involving integrals which computes the center of mass of this bar.
Note: you do not need to compute the integrals! (But you can if you want to.)
